title: Guys help plz
body:
How can i set a club tag when it said's that ______ doesn't have requirements to set the tag???
E.G.BeenTouched1~Name
Supak~Club Tag 

PLZ tell me how to set tag.
Ty.{{summoner:3}}

replies.body: I looked into this and don't see that you have a club tag yet, but I don't believe it's due to an error.  Doing some light research, I'm thinking the name is inappropriate and filtered out.  You may need to make a tag appropriate for the community.  Hope that helps!
